title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2700.8 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2700.8 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
no fee charged for: (1)

Inspections of
records. (2)

Search for
records. (3)

Any certification
pursuant to this Part. (b) (1)

The
fee for photocopies not exceeding 8-1/2 by 14 inches is 25 cents per
page. (2)

The fee for copies of
records other than photocopies which are 8-1/2 by 14 inches or less in size
shall be the actual copying cost excluding fixed costs of the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2700.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
